name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 6, in Pingding Town, Huazhou, Guangdong, an old man picked up a brick from the ground and rushed towards the traffic police to protect his motorcycle. The traffic police fled after seeing this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of July 6, in Yan'an, Shaanxi, a netizen live-streamed in Phoenix Plaza to speak out for the girl who fell from a building, but the live-streaming room was banned by the platform.
https://t.co/EnJ6mFxmdD

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shaanxi Yan'an Middle School. Someone placed a row of oranges and flowers at the place where the girl fell from the building. Some students also posted posters in the toilet, accusing the teacher involved of misleading students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Due to the recent occurrence of too many incidents in Shenyang, Liaoning,
On July 6, Shenyang launched a summer security inspection. According to videos shot by netizens, the streets in Tiexi District were full of police cars that day, and the police went to every nightclub to give lectures.
A large number of netizens left comments and ridicule in the comment area. One netizen replied: Tiexi Grand Stage, you can come to fight against the disease, free little Fengtian, knife stand every day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 7, Guiping City, Guangxi. The property management of Kaiyue International Community charged unreasonable fees and occupied the common area of the owners. The owners put up banners in the community to defend their rights. During this period, the special police snatched the banners from the owners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 6, in Jieyang, Guangdong, it was reported online that an unlicensed car hit six or seven pedestrians along the way, and finally lost control and overturned with four wheels facing up. The scene was a mess. The driver fled, and there was a woman in the passenger seat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6, Putian, Fujian. The land of Dongzhu Village was expropriated, but the government has failed to solve the resettlement problem of the villagers for 19 years. Not only that, some rights-defending villagers were detained by local officials in the Xinghua Pearl Hotel in Hanjiang District. On the same day, villagers rushed to the hotel to rescue the detained villagers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 7, an explosion occurred in a factory in Zhongtang Town, Dongguan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 7, the flood situation in Linyi, Shandong. The video shows that the streets were severely flooded and the garage was flooded.
The Linyi Meteorological Observatory warned that the average cumulative precipitation from the night of the 7th to the 9th would be 140~200 mm, with local precipitation exceeding 300 mm.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6, Henan. An old man kneels outside the Xincai County Government on a hot day. The government closes the electric gate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A restaurant in Zhengzhou, Henan, put up a slogan:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 5, Chengdu, Sichuan. A woman posted a video saying that she and her friends were harassed and beaten by a drunk man while having dinner at a mall. She asked him to apologize, but he replied: I just want to beat you. The woman said she was so scared that she was shaking, vomiting and dizzy. The four drunk men laughed the whole time and then left. Afterwards, she went to the hospital and was diagnosed with concussion, head injury, and waist injury.
On July 7, it was reported that the attacker was detained for 5 days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Flood rescue site in Linyi, Shandong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Changzhou, Jiangsu. A woman posted a video saying that she is a female soldier currently serving in the army. The factory building at her home was deemed illegal by the Xicheng Subdistrict Office in Changzhou, Jiangsu and was demolished. The court has ruled that the demolition by the Subdistrict Office was illegal. The woman said that she and her parents were injured and placed under house arrest during the demolition. The Subdistrict Office also called and threatened, "If you dare to sue the government once, we will go to the army and sue you twice."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 5, the Economic Daily reported: Fully unleash the consumption potential in rural areas and let rural people dare to consume and be willing to consume.

content: On July 7, the Weibo topic #China will usher in a peak in population deaths# became a hot search. As of the time of posting, the topic has been removed from the platform.

content: On July 6, Shenyang dispatched police cars to bomb the streets, triggering ridicule from netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 6, Huarong County issued a notice accepting social donations, which was ridiculed by a large number of netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 6, after the Dongting Lake burst its dam, animals survived in the water.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 7 (Released) Chengdu, Sichuan. A netizen posted a video saying that he found an old man with a snakeskin bag on his back wandering outside the Chinese Medicine Hospital, and he approached almost every food stall to ask about the price. Maybe he thought it was too expensive and didn't buy anything, so in the end the old man only bought a cheap naan. After seeing this, a kind-hearted netizen bought a breakfast for the old man.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6, Dongguan, Guangdong. Students carried their luggage to Dongguan factories to work as summer interns, but were told by the intermediary that the hourly wage was only 8 yuan. The video shows that the intermediary shouted at the summer interns in front of them, "Not even one more yuan, only 8 yuan an hour, are you willing to work?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Cold knowledge
In this summer when floods and waterlogging broke out all over the country, "Deeply Studying and Implementing Xi Jinping's Important Theory on Water Management" is about to celebrate its first anniversary of publication.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 5, Pingjiang County, Hunan. A disaster victim posted a video saying that it has been five days since the disaster on the 1st, and he only received six buckets of instant noodles and a few bottles of mineral water. He didn't see any rice or oil. "Thanks to the Pingjiang leaders for leaking the results"
Some netizens said that they also had no supplies, or only received very few supplies.
https://t.co/PL6NhVdSzi

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: The date is July 5, before the Dongting Lake burst its banks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6 (Released) Hubei Yichang. The video shows that the police came to the door and only showed a blank summons, and wanted to take the woman away. The woman kept saying "What law have I broken?"
